page.title: 10EVENTS-THE GOLDEN HARE
page.content: The{Golden Hare}was found in 1980. Mr. Kit Williams had made it and buried it as part of a book that he had written.He made it out of gold and other precious stones.It was buried in Ampthill Park at the foot of Katherine's Cross. Kit Williams is also a painter,and all the illustrations from the book were painted by him.Kit Williams also made up the riddles on how to find{The {Golden Hare.}The gold and precious stones cost less than Â£1,500 though the pendant was worth Â£5,000 when he had finished it.He made a container out of clay and engraved upon it the words; {"I am the keeper of the jewel of {Masquerade which lies waiting safe {inside me for you or eternity". The Hare was found by a man who had followed some of the clues!
